title: Average retail price for regular , unleaded gasoline in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for both 2016 and 2015 have reduced.
For Month May, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 1359.0 among the 5 groups and in Feb, 2016 had the lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 867.0.
Month Jun and Feb had the biggest gap of 219.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter found for 2016.
yAxis: Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for both 2016 and 2015 have reduced.
mid_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for both 2016 and 2015 have reduced.
For Month May, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 1359.0 among the 5 groups and in Feb, 2016 had the lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 867.0.
Month Jun and Feb had the biggest gap of 219.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter found for 2016.
max_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for 2016 and 2015. In both cases, the Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter have reduced.
Out of all 5 groups, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for Month May and 2016 had the lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for Month Feb.
Among all the Months, 2016 had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter in Month Jun and lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter in Month Feb.

The maximum Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for 2016 that was found in Month Jun was 1.25 times larger than the minimum Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter observed in Month Feb.
Among all 5 groups, 2018 had the gap of 295.0 between the maximum and minimum Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter observed in Month May and Dec respectively.

In case of Month May, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 1359.0 among the 5 groups and in Feb, 2016 had the lowest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 867.0. The second highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter 1191.0 was observed for 2018 in Month May.

On average, the Month May had the highest Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Feb had the lowest average Average retail price in Canadian cents per liter.
